text: mattu nivu kanuviri; avarannu adara (narakada) munde hajaru padisaladaga avaru apamanadinda, dinaragi ardha tereda kannugalinda noduttiruvaru. Mattu visvasigalu heluvaru; punarut'thana dina tam'mannu hagu tam'ma bandhugalannu nastakkolapadisikondavare nijavagi nasta anubhavisidavaragiddare. Nimage tilidirali. Akramigalu khandita sasvatavada siksegolagaguvaru
